query:
SELECT 
            username as "username!",
            address as "address!",
            profile_picture_url,
            nullifier_hash as "nullifier_hash!",
            verification_level as "verification_level!",
            created_at as "created_at!",
            updated_at as "updated_at!"
        FROM names 
        WHERE username = $1 
        UNION ALL 
        SELECT 
            username as "username!",
            address as "address!",
            profile_picture_url,
            nullifier_hash as "nullifier_hash!",
            verification_level as "verification_level!",
            created_at as "created_at!",
            updated_at as "updated_at!"
        FROM names 
        WHERE address = $1
